Text:
I'm working on the next set and I'm having trouble with the scans.  The pages seem to be much thinner and the other side of the page is bleeding through.  Here is an example:

http://bayimg.com/PajjHAaDB

If anyone has suggestions on how to fix this, please let me know.
@bestec: try putting dark paper behind your scan. btw, thx for these ups.
Agreed.  Put black construction paper behind the page.  Thanks!
